gw.datatype

Class DataTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.datatype.DataTypes

  • public final class DataTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for getting datatype info from features.
    Author:
    pdalbora

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IDataType get(java.lang.Class<?> valueClass)
      Deprecated. 
      Use a specific datatype instead.
      static IDataType get(IAnnotatedFeatureInfo feature)
      Gets the datatype associated with the given feature, or null if none.
      static IDataType get(IEntityPropertyInfo feature) 
      static IDataType get(IQueryablePropertyInfo feature)
      Gets the datatype associated with the given feature, or null if none.
      static IDataType get(java.lang.String name, java.util.Map<? extends java.lang.String,? extends java.lang.String> parameters)
      Gets the datatype identified by the given name, and parametrized by the given parameters.
      static boolean isStrict()
      Utility method for determining whether data types are running in "strict" mode.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • get

        public static IDataType get(java.lang.Class<?> valueClass)
        Deprecated. Use a specific datatype instead.
        Gets the default datatype associated with the given value class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given value class is not associated with a default datatype.

      • isStrict

        public static boolean isStrict()
        Utility method for determining whether data types are running in "strict" mode.
